content.text: Hera is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum competing for the Mera Mera no Mi.

Hera is a tall man with thick muscles. He is bare-chested and barefoot. He wears a spiked ridge helmet, studded wristbands, and a dark paludamentum. The back of his paludamentum bears his name and participant number. He also carries a longsword.
Not much is known about Hera’s personality.
He is seen carrying a sword and is presumably proficient in using it.
Hera was in the waiting room when Luffy arrived, waiting for his turn to fight. The manga did not state which block he was placed in, but a scene in the anime listed him as registered in D Block.

elements.text: In Greek mythology, Hera is the name of the goddess of marriage, women and birth.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 71 Chapter 703 and Episode 633, Hera is seen in the Corrida Colosseum waiting room as a gladiator.
↑  One Piece Anime — Episode 633, Thunder Soldier looks at a board listing the notable gladiators from each block.
